markdownRemark.html:
Just a quick update…

I found myself stumbling on a really intense and worthy challenge of creating a really useful android app that can help manage our climate problem. That is why I will take my whole react experience and learn react native for building apps in the android echo system.

This probably is the toughest challenge yet as I choose to build it from scratch…(no idea of how react native works, excited and anxious..)

I will also blog its progress…so stay tuned?
